Content: Hah! Did you really think you could beat me? That was pathetic!
I... I can’t believe I lost.
Face it, you’re just not good enough to beat a champion like me!
So, what’s it going to be? Are you brave enough for another round, or are you done embarrassing yourself?
I’ll race again! I won’t back down!
You win this time. I’ll be back next year.
